item.title: Craigslist AutoPosting Tools 1.72
item.description: Name : Craigslist Auto Posting Tools Version : 1.72 OS : Windows Type : Craigslist Marketing Tools, Facebook Group Marketing Tools, Facebook Fanpage Tools,..Many More,..45 Modules Price : $99 Homepage : SalePage Craigslist Auto Posting Software first video for auto posting ads to Craigslist. #1 Craigslist posting tool to manage, create, and post multiple ads to CL with a single click of a button. Learn how to setup your ad content so that you can start posting your ad campaigns today! If you are in this page probably is because you are interested in increasing your clients, having more traffic to your site, promoting products online. The software i am about to show you will help you to do all that and much more. This software is a compilation of multiple software, each with powerful features like Facebook posting, fiver scrapping, Craigslist posting, Craigslist flagging, Paypal link generator and much more. In this page you will find some videos presenting you the many features that we have. That’s not all, we are always updating the software to make it more powerful, with more functionality and more features. I want to thank you for your interest in this software that will change your life. You think you want this software, but the truth is, YOU NEED THIS SOFTWARE!! That’s Right you need the software to take your marketing to the next level. This is a list of the modules available in the software. With a little description on what they do. And how you can use them for your business.
item.yandex:full-text: Features Craigslist Auto Posting And AutoRenewing : Create a list of ads,then let the program post the ads at the specified time, Multiple Account use Proxy Support, Auto renew your old ads. Craigslist Ad Flagging : Remove the ads of your competitors, Place the URL of the page of Craigslist where your competitors areUse proxy and flag all of their ads, Since you flagged them with multiple proxy Craigslist will think other people flag them. It will remove the ads of your competitors and leave only your ads. Youtube Video Downloader : Download videos to your computer, to watch them offline, or use it to get traffic, download a video with many views, re-brand it and re-upload it with your links to offers, affiliate links or subscription to your list. Facebook Group Commentor : Login to your Account, create a list of all your groups, Load your comments, and it will comment automatically to all your Facebook Groups, Save time and get more exposure to your offers. Email Scrapper and Email Sender : Do you need to create an email list? Well we can help you with that, this module will look for emails related to the keywords you specified. This is useful because you find people interested on the keyword you try to target, so people is more likely to take the offer you promote because they are interested. This generate you a list of emails that you can export to mail chimp and send emails to them or use the email sender and let it work for you. Youtube Video Scrapper : This is like the search video option in YouTube but here you can save the list of videos into excel, then you can contact the most popular videos offer them 10 dollars for putting a link with an offer that will generate you money, use the trafic of the video to your favor. Or you can tell them to work with you and split profits, you give the offer and he just put the link, both make money. Win- Win Situation. Facebook Fanpage Scrapper : Get a list of fan pages based on keywords, Get laser targeted traffic by getting a list of fanpages related to your keyword. If you are in marketing you can grab all marketing fan pages, comment there promoting you marketing related offer. Craigslist and Fiver Arbitrage : Scrape Craigslist and find people that need a service then Scrape fiverr find people that would do the service for 5 dollars then resell that service to other people at a higher price. Keep the difference. That simple.Make money being the middle man. Badoo Girl Liker : Badoo is a site that allows you to meet other people, for dating or friends. You like other people and if they like you back you can talk with them. Its boring to be liking people all day, so let the software like everybody if they like you back you will have more friends, if they don’t then doesn’t matter it took you 1 minute to set up the software. Google Keyword Scrapper : Get the top 10 websites for a keyword and get the information of that site, like title of the page, description of the page and keywords they try to target. Analyze your competition. Become the God of SEO. ClickBank Top Products : Clickbank is the bigger retailer of digital products, promote the best affiliate offers and generate recurring income. Paypal Payment Link Creator : Create payment buttons almost instantaneous without going to PayPal. Create payment link and create short link. Free Proxies Scrapper : If you ever need to access to a site anonymously, generate fake views or just change your ip for privacy, you need proxies, this modules will generate 200 proxys for you, the proxys are checked regularly so you only will have proxies that work. Yelp Company Scrapper : Get more leads for your promotions. This will go to yelp and will get the top 10 companies for any keyword you selected. Then you can visit their ads, or website and then call them to offer a service that they need. Youtube and Google Keyword Suggestion Tool 2016 – Lasser Target Keywords : When you look on google or YouTube , it give you suggestions of what other people typed this are popular and hot keywords, this module extract the keywords and give it to you in a list : Mega Spinner (Create sppined Articles) : Do you want your ads to be different every time you post on Craigslist or Kijiji.This software will help you to create the spin sintaxis of the ads. That means you post the same ad changing a few words here and there creating multiple variations of the same ad or article. you can type a keyword and it will give you synonyms of that words. Don’t reinvent the wheel. Youtube Keyword Scrapper : Steal the traffic of your competitors, if you analyze the keyword from multiple videos related, you will see which keywords are more often used, then you can create a new title and description using those keywords. Generating more traffic to your video using the help of your competitors without them knowing. They will wonder about your secret. Keyword Variation Generator : From a list of keywords, it will give you multiple variations of the keywords, very useful for SEO and dominating any niche : Kijiji Posting : Kijiji is a classified website just like craiglist, very popular in Canada, Post on Kijiji with the same Features as Craigslist Auto Posting Software : Torrent Scrapper (The Pirate Bay and Kick Ass Torrent) : Used in conjunction with utorrent and you can download pretty much everything, software, music, videos and ebooks. It uses The pirate bay and kick ass torrent as content provider. Youtube Video Views Increaser : This software will visit your youtube videos many times, generating more views, you can have multiple videos at the same time, and it will generate traffic to the videos, you can use it for your own channel or sell the traffic to other people. You get traffic on demand with just a few clicks. Link Cloacker Generator : It will generate php files to redirect your visitors to any page you like, the link would look like http://yoursite.com/go/anything-you-want and you can chose the url that it will link to, plus if you want to direct the traffic to a different page, you can change it afterwards : Bulk Shortened links : Shorten multiple links and give it to you in a list. YouTube Comment Scrapper : Do you want to get the comments from a video, but you have to select each comment and copy paste it onto excel, Forget that! Use this software just place the YouTube video id, and get all the comments from that video. Ebay Best Selling Items Scraper, Most Popular Keywords, Auction sniper.Get the price and URL of the best selling products by keyword, you will find the best selling items by category, the most searched keywords by category, eBay keyword suggestion tool, see what people is looking for, provide it to them its just like printing money. Also spy on your competitions, see what items they are selling and how well they sell, so you only chose products that do sell. Reddit Scrapping : Are you looking for interesting content for you posts, or articles, well you are lucky. This software scrape the content from the site Reddit where users thumbs up images, videos, articles they like. If it got likes on Reddit that means is interesting, so you can use this for you Facebook post to generate more likes and more engagement in your fanpage/blog/website. Email, text encryption : Paste your text in the software and encrypt it, this means that the text will not be readable for anyone that does not have the software and the password. Fully secure conversations trough email. (Since the text is encrypted) : Image Extractor : Want to get all images from a website only with a few clicks. Then use this module. In this module you type the URL with all the pictures that you want to download to your computer, and the software will create a list of the images, and download them individually or all of them and save them in a folder of your choice : Twitter Tweets Extractor : Get all the tweets of your favorite artist, get quotes, get jokes, get comments made to the specific account that you chose : Google Image Scraper – Affiliate HTML Code Image Creator : Search google images and create HTML code with your affiliate link. Anonymous Web browser : Simple Web browser that allows you to change proxy and user agent, you can clear cookies. You can navigate anonymously using proxies. You can create accounts to any site because you will be consider a different user. You can vote multiple times in contests, you by pass sites that banned your ip. Manual Posting to 28 Classified sites : Simple but powerful, you can use your Craigslist ads already spinned, sing up with the same account as Craigslist and use this module to copy and paste into all the 28 different classified sites, you need more exposure for your ads. Use this and promote anything that you want. You make more sells as your ads will get more exposure to more classified sites. Fake Name Generator : Whenever you are creating fake accounts or fake profiles, this will give you the name, address, phone and fake information that will allow you to create hundredths of accounts as easy as copying and pasting the information that we give you. Article Scrapper : Do you need content for your website or eBook? use this software to scrape articles, then you can use the articles as content, you can modify them and then get more exposure for your business. look articles related by keyword. Qr Code Generator : This will generate you a qr code image that you can use in your graphic design images, to redirect people to your website, you can use it to store information for people to read with their mobile devices, put your affiliate or cpa offer links in the qr code and make people buy from your their phone. Project and task management module : Track your activities to do, your activities complete, check on the calendar whatever appointment you have. Email yourself the activities for today. Keep organized and order your to do list by priority, Improve your productivity. Tee spring analyzer : Make money selling t-shirst easy to follow system that will analyze your competition, see what t-shirts do sell and get ideas on what you can sell. Customer Relationship Managment (CRM) : Keep a track of your clients, suppliers, freelancers, all in one software, you can email them directly trough the software, you can track the interactions with your customers. Check their information right away with our built in search feature by different search types. city, phone, country and more Point of sale system with inventory : Create invoices or quotes for your clients, you can save your products and services and then select them in the make a sale section, it will tell you the total and will generate you a PDF with a payment link to PayPal, so people can pay you in PayPal optimizing the your process, You can track your orders and see the total revenue you make every month Landing Page Creator : Create amazing landing pages that will save the information of your visitors (Name and Email) then it will send them to your affiliate page, Build your list while you do your affiliate marketing, make money and then with your list you can email them and promote anything you want. The money is on the list. Mobile Checker – Email Sender : Search google based on a keyword, then analyze the results to see if they are mobile friendly, if they are not get their email information and email them with your mobile websites services. Make almost instant money, since the google updates they give preference to sites that are mobile friendly. Yellow Pages Lead Finder – Email Sender : Get leads from yellow pages based on keyword, then it will check if those users are on social media and create a seo report about those sites. Then contact the owners and offer your services about seo, website development and traffic generation Twitter Auto Follower : Want more twitter followers to promote yourself or your business, give the twitter id of someone relevant in your niche, and follow his fan base, the software will follow them and then they will follow you back. Wait 2 days and then remove the people that did not follow you back. Increase your fan base is so easy and made on autopilot. Kijiji Ad Scrapper : Type a keyword and find people looking for those services, if i type website development i will find people that need a website, then i can contact them and make money. Getting clients have never been that easier. Facebook Fanpage Commentor : Use the list of fanpages that we extract with the fanpage extractor and post on every single one of them with multiple accounts, proxy support and cookies cleaning

item.title: GumtreeDominator 1.13
item.description: Name : GumtreeDominator Version : 1.13 OS : Windows Type : Gumtree Marketing Price : $499 Homepage : SalePage GumtreeDominator is specially designed to get data for respective niches, so that every business gets their targeted audience easily. Data from various Gumtree categories can be easily extracted according to selected location(s) or directly scrape using URL. It allows saving data in CSV format while running your email marketing campaigns. It's incredibly easy to configure the scraper and you can start scraping the data within minutes of installing GumtreeDominator. With around 8 million unique visitors a month, Gumtree.com is one of the most visited sites in the UK. Gumtree registers its presence in multiple cities across numerous countries including the United Kingdom, Poland, France, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa and Hong Kong. Gumtree has the #1 classifieds site in the UK, Australia, South Africa and Singapore. Gumtree largest category of classifieds adverts (goods for sale) attracts up to 2 million ads being every month, along with being a preferred destination for around 200,000 motors listings across the UK any time. Gumtree is also the second largest UK listings site for jobs and the third largest for property. The site recorded 8.1 million unique visitors (as of June 2014). This has immense significance for a marketer trying to attract generate more traffic to its site and thereby converting the traffic to leads, leads to customers and customers to revenue.
item.yandex:full-text: Features Select Campaign : Create, edit or delete a campaigns. Gumtree Scraper : Fetch all the data in a chose Classifieds Category for a specific Country, State/County. Gumtree Data : Store, organize, export or delete data collected from Gumtree. Proxy Setting : Get uninterrupted experience while scraping Gumtree data. Campaign Manager : Maintain records and status of all campaigns.
item.turbo:content:
Features


  • Select Campaign : Create, edit or delete a campaigns.
  • Gumtree Scraper : Fetch all the data in a chose Classifieds Category for a specific Country, State/County.
  • Gumtree Data : Store, organize, export or delete data collected from Gumtree.
  • Proxy Setting : Get uninterrupted experience while scraping Gumtree data.
  • Campaign Manager : Maintain records and status of all campaigns.

item.title: CraigsList Dominator 3.02
item.description: Name :CraigsList Dominator Version : 3.02 OS : Windows Type : CraigsList Marketing Price : $499 Homepage : SalePage CraigsDominator specially designs to get data for respective niches, so that every business gets their targeted audience easily. Data from various Craigslist categories can be easily extracted according to selected location(s) or directly scrape using URL. It allows saving data in CSV format while running your email marketing campaigns. It's incredibly easy to configure the scraper and you can start scraping the data within minutes after installing. Craigslist is one big market: according to company executives, the site draws more than 50 billion page views each month. Craiglist, one of the best online classified ads websites, helps business owner across all verticals and niches to advertise, recruit and promote their business to a huge audience in no time and cost. From e-commerce websites to furniture wholesalers, businesses are realizing the marketing power of Craigslist. It gets an estimated 10 million unique visitors per day. With an online classified ads format organized by either region or city, Craigslist connects buyers and sellers in more than 300 communities. Numerous major corporations are now advertising on Craiglist as it?€™s so well-known as a one-stop shopping point for its users. If you've never heard of Craigslist or never considered using the site effectively to market your business, CraigsDominator will show you how you can use Craigslist to boost your sales.
item.yandex:full-text: Features Select Campaign : This feature used to create, edit or delete a campaign. You have to select a campaign before performing any operation for respective country/location. Craigslist Scraper : This feature allows user to fetch all the data from the Craigslist site using Direct URL and Location wise method Craigslist Data : Craigslist data feature, specially designed for storing data. It has 2 submodule, one for storing scraped data and one for storing sent mail data. Proxy Setting : Proxy setting provides you to add public and private proxy, to make your process easy and reduce the chance of IP ban. Campaign Manager : Storing all the details regarding the campaign with proper location, category, running status and starting date for a campaign.
item.turbo:content:
Features


  • Select Campaign : This feature used to create, edit or delete a campaign. You have to select a campaign before performing any operation for respective country/location.
  • Craigslist Scraper : This feature allows user to fetch all the data from the Craigslist site using Direct URL and Location wise method
  • Craigslist Data : Craigslist data feature, specially designed for storing data. It has 2 submodule, one for storing scraped data and one for storing sent mail data.
  • Proxy Setting : Proxy setting provides you to add public and private proxy, to make your process easy and reduce the chance of IP ban.
  • Campaign Manager : Storing all the details regarding the campaign with proper location, category, running status and starting date for a campaign.

item.title: Yelp Data Scraper 1.0.2.18 Standard
item.description: Name : Yelp Data Scraper Version : 1.0.2.18 Standard OS : Windows Type : Local Marketing Bot, Email Extractor Price : $80 Homepage : SalePage Use our Yelp Data Scraper tool to Build your Own Database for Marketing Purpose Are you looking for a Yelp data scraping software? You are on the right site! Our Yelp data scraper is a versatile, lightweight and powerful Yelp extractor tools. No need to hire an expensive programmer, no need to pay data mining companies for completed databases with our Yelp data scraper you are in full control. Scrape as much data as you like in any niche that you need all with the press of a button.
item.yandex:full-text: Features You can search and gather thousands of business details matching a chosen profession within any location worldwide! Yelp data scraper allows you to scrape business listings by entering input parameters like keywords or category, city/state, and give the list of business details listed on yelp website. Yelp data scraper for United States (USA) Yelp data scraper software for Canada Yelp Scraper tool for United Kingdom (UK) Yelp extractor for Australia & New Zealand Yelp extractor program for France Yelp extractor tools for Belgium Yelp scraper app for Europe countries and all the other country supported by Yelp.com website
item.turbo:content:
Features


You can search and gather thousands of business details matching a chosen profession within any location worldwide! Yelp data scraper allows you to scrape business listings by entering input parameters like keywords or category, city/state, and give the list of business details listed on yelp website.
  • Yelp data scraper for United States (USA)
  • Yelp data scraper software for Canada
  • Yelp Scraper tool for United Kingdom (UK)

item.title: YellowPages Lead Search 1.1
item.description: Name : YellowPages Lead Search Version : 1.1 OS : Windows/MAC Type : YellowPagesScraper Tools Price : $27 Homepage : SalePage Recent Study Shows That As Of June 1st Over 1,000 Businesses Have Been Looking To Cancel Their 12 Month Ads Contracts With The Yellow Pages. And Are NOW Actively Looking For Marketing Company's To Help Them With Pay Per Call Campaigns.
item.yandex:full-text: Features Software – software enables your buyers to find businesses who are advertising on YP in any niche. You can even sort them by reputation or proximity + export anytime. Quick Guide – Within this quick guide users will learn exactly how they can offer pay per call with out any ties or upfront cost. Contract Templates – easy to read templates with no hidden lines. Users can use these and them to directly to any potential prospect who is interested in getting more calls. Training – Live training (pause or rewind any time) lots of pure content on how to convert these leads into their own pay per call clients. Mastermind – we even created a mastermind to keep the value coming in daily.
item.turbo:content:
Features


  • Software – software enables your buyers to find businesses who are advertising on YP in any niche. You can even sort them by reputation or proximity + export anytime.
  • Quick Guide – Within this quick guide users will learn exactly how they can offer pay per call with out any ties or upfront cost.
  • Contract Templates – easy to read templates with no hidden lines. Users can use these and them to directly to any potential prospect who is interested in getting more calls.
  • Training – Live training (pause or rewind any time) lots of pure content on how to convert these leads into their own pay per call clients.
  • Mastermind – we even created a mastermind to keep the value coming in daily.

item.title: Classified Ads Reply 1.1
item.description: Name : Classified Ads Reply + OTO1 Version : 1.1 OS : Windows/MAC Type : Craiglist Reply Bot Price : $37 Homepage : SalePage Classified ad reply software enables marketers to auto reply to craigslist listings without bending any of the craigslist rules. C-A-R takes a human approach when replying to craigslist listings. It doesn’t bend any of the CL rules or terms and conditions. In fact users still need to fill out a recaptcha in order to reply to a listing. The automation process happens after the user has entered the CL email into the software. The software will then follow up Based on how many leads the user wants to follow up with.Below is a basic break down on how this process works…

Classified Ad Reply Software was built for the marketer looking to provide marketing services to businesses on craigslist. We wanted to build a solution that enabled our community members to reply craigslist listings without interfering with the craigslist platform. C-A-R takes the more human approach by enabling the user to take the same exact steps they would to reply to a listing. But instead C-A-R is doing all of the sending on autopilot with out interfering with craigslist. Here’s a quick break down on what C-A-R is doing while you are watching it work… After you’ve preset you email, attachment and of course set-up your SMTP. The software will take the more human approach and reply to each listing based on the number of threads you entered into the software. After it has completed sending all you have to do is check your emails for possible prospects that have replied to your messages. There’s just isn’t anything like this on the market today! That app alone gets 10 billion check-ins. But in just 1 entire day DATA shows they receive 10 million check-ins.

item.title: SWW Leads 1.0
item.description: Name : SWW Leads Version : 1.0 OS : Windows/MAC Type : Squarespace, Wix And Weebly Lead Scraper Price : $27 Homepage : SalePage Software Finds Local Businesses Using Squarespace, Wix And Weebly And Provides You With The (Temporary URL & Template Site) The Business Is Using Via The Platforms Above. Export And Email All Leads At Will Directly From The Software. PLUS In Our LIVE Over The Shoulder Training You’ll Learn How To Turn These Local Leads Into Clients Repeatedly.
item.yandex:full-text: Features Squarespace, Wix & Weebly are great platforms if you're a business bringing business online. The problem is the template sites + temporary urls for example: Salon dot Wix dot com Isn’t going to work out for the business in the long wrong especially in the online world. Branding is something that is instilled in most of us local marketers online. Having a website that fully stands out from the competition and speaks volume keeps it’s value. It’s no different then having a brandable chiropractic office, salon or shop. If it makes the consumer feel good they will more than likely stick around for the long run. 99% of the businesses using these platforms are either in a rush, don’t have the time or feel like it’s an easier alternative when compared to agency pricing. So what’s the point? If they aren’t willing to invest in real branding with a local agency then when will they. Today! Our staff has been working double time looking for ways to serve you these leads on a platter. We built a software that scavenges through Google and delivers the leads on your Mac or PC. The software is called “SWW” its finds leads leads using Squarespace, Wix & Weebly. But not just ANY because some of them are paid. It provides you with ONLY the businesses using Trial versions, templates and Url’s that end with the service dot com as mentioned in the example. This NEW technology is going to save us local marketers a ton of time and will surely help you find REAL deal local clients on autopilot. BUT that's not all…
item.turbo:content:
Features


Squarespace, Wix & Weebly are great platforms if you're a business bringing business online. The problem is the template sites + temporary urls for example: Salon dot Wix dot com Isn’t going to work out for the business in the long wrong especially in the online world.

Branding is something that is instilled in most of us local marketers online. Having a website that fully stands out from the competition and speaks volume keeps it’s value. It’s no different then having a brandable chiropractic office, salon or shop. If it makes the consumer feel good they will more than likely stick around for the long run.

99% of the businesses using these platforms are either in a rush, don’t have the time or feel like it’s an easier alternative when compared to agency pricing. So what’s the point? If they aren’t willing to invest in real branding with a local agency then when will they. Today!

Our staff has been working double time looking for ways to serve you these leads on a platter. We built a software that scavenges through Google and delivers the leads on your Mac or PC. The software is called “SWW” its finds leads leads using Squarespace, Wix & Weebly. But not just ANY because some of them are paid. It provides you with ONLY the businesses using Trial versions, templates and Url’s that end with the service dot com as mentioned in the example.

This NEW technology is going to save us local marketers a ton of time and will surely help you find REAL deal local clients on autopilot.

BUT that's not all…

item.title: Yelp Consultant 2.0.3
item.description: Name : Yelp Consultant Version : 2.0.3 OS : Windows/MAC Type : Local Marketing Tools Price : $37 Homepage : SalePage Yelp Consultant Software Finds Unclaimed Yelp Listings And Lets You Choose The Type Of Leads You Want By Ratings. And Because This Is A Yelp Approved Software You’ll Have Access To Comments Made By Consumers And Other Important Data!
item.yandex:full-text: Features Yelp is the go to place for every consumer including myself. Before I go anywhere the first place I look is yelp. Why yelp? Like anyone else I like to make sure that any restaurant, spa or gyms I decide to go to meet my expectations. And that’s exactly what the general consumer is expecting as well. It’s human nature to want the best things out of life and in today’s time that go to place is yelp. But what happens when a business gets repeatedly gets hit with bad reviews? Yep you guessed it! It shows rite on google. And any potential customers that look up the business will see that the business isn’t doing well. So what the potential customer is going to do is try another service that offers the same thing but at a better quality. And what if the listing is unclaimed? As I mentioned very earlier yelp is the #1 place for the general eye to go and seek out the business before attendance. Even if the business is with in proximity it doesn’t matter. If the business has not been claimed or has no reviews I would probably turn away. Consumers turning away… No business wants that. So we built a solutions that has been approved by yelp! It’s called “YELP CONSULTANT” and it find unclaimed businesses on yelp and lets you sort out businesses by start rating like never before. Bad Mouthing… Yeas “YELP CONSULTANT” gets you all of the bad comments bad on the business listing so you can export it via CSV. We are consultants and we need everything possible to be able to turn these potential prospects into client fast. So yelp was kind enough to provide us with a full load of data you can use in your business to come in an help these businesses. You control the data you need from yelp! Sort Out Business Ratings Over 1000 Business Records Bad Comments Available Via CSV Find Unclaimed Listing Phone Numbers Complete Mailing Address And tons more DATA available for you at your control! We can’t wait for you to start using this software in your local consulting business. We are making it available to our customers only just this week. You can grab a single license for $17 or go big with unlimited installations for only $37. Don't forget theres a 2 day Yelp Consultant intensive training you don't want to miss out on.
item.turbo:content:
Features



Yelp is the go to place for every consumer including myself. Before I go anywhere the first place I look is yelp. Why yelp? Like anyone else I like to make sure that any restaurant, spa or gyms I decide to go to meet my expectations. And that’s exactly what the general consumer is expecting as well. It’s human nature to want the best things out of life and in today’s time that go to place is yelp.

But what happens when a business gets repeatedly gets hit with bad reviews?

Yep you guessed it! It shows rite on google. And any potential customers that look up the business will see that the business isn’t doing well. So what the potential customer is going to do is try another service that offers the same thing but at a better quality.

And what if the listing is unclaimed?

As I mentioned very earlier yelp is the #1 place for the general eye to go and seek out the business before attendance. Even if the business is with in proximity it doesn’t matter. If the business has not been claimed or has no reviews I would probably turn away.

Consumers turning away…

No business wants that. So we built a solutions that has been approved by yelp!

Bad Mouthing…

Yeas “YELP CONSULTANT” gets you all of the bad comments bad on the business listing so you can export it via CSV.

We are consultants and we need everything possible to be able to turn these potential prospects into client fast. So yelp was kind enough to provide us with a full load of data you can use in your business to come in an help these businesses.

item.title: Craigslist AreaChanger 2.43
item.description: Name : Craigslist AreaChanger & Auto Poster Version : 2.43 OS : Windows Type : Craigslist Marketing Tools Price : $66 Homepage : SalePage Allows you to create and post to multiple (up to 20) Craigslist accounts in multiple cities by changing computer IP.
item.yandex:full-text: Features For use with multiple Craigslist accounts in multiple cities/areas Craigslist AreaChanger multi-acct multi-area Craigslist city/area changer tool — multi-acct, multi-area Temporarily changes IP at computer level, while you create and/or post to your Craigslist accounts. CL AreaChanger can manage up to 20 accounts at once.

Features


For use with multiple Craigslist accounts in multiple cities/areas
  • Craigslist AreaChanger multi-acct multi-area
  • Craigslist city/area changer tool — multi-acct, multi-area
  • Temporarily changes IP at computer level, while you create and/or post to your Craigslist accounts.
